mainText:
Hi,
 
I live in Seoul, Korea and I don't know Steve in person of course.
But I am using iPhone and iPad 2 and always surprised of how those products are innovative and kind.
Thanks to him, I feel that I am in 21st century indeed.
 
Steve, the world in 10 years with you
          the world in 10 years without you
          it must be different...I will miss you.
          
I am sorry for the loss of great man.
author: Moon Sun
